resources.string: (Click on FAB to check Single permission.\nTo test again, change the app permission in settings or reinstall the app)

1.Settings > About Phone >Software information / Build Number / MiIUI version (tap 7 times) Check your device settings.\n2. Tap the device version message until you receive a message telling you that you are a developer.\n
1.Go to Settings > Additional settings > Developer options.\n2.Select mock location app like-:"MockMe".\n

1.Please make sure that you have enabled "MockMe" app and Device Location.
2.To mock Location, drag map and choose location.
3.Press Play Button to Mock Location, Pause Button to stop service!.
4.Tap Map Icon to change map layout.
